thread.title: Trump optimistic on Korea talks, but experts skeptical

title: Trump optimistic on Korea talks, but experts skeptical
text:
Trump optimistic on Korea talks, but experts skeptical 3:43pm IST - 02:27 
Feeling the pressure of sanctions, North Korea seems “sincere” in its apparent willingness to halt nuclear tests if it held denuclearization talks with the United States, President Donald Trump said on Tuesday as U.S., South Korean and Japanese officials voiced skepticism about any discussions.   
Feeling the pressure of sanctions, North Korea seems “sincere” in its apparent willingness to halt nuclear tests if it held denuclearization talks with the United States, President Donald Trump said on Tuesday as U.S., South Korean and Japanese officials voiced skepticism about any discussions.  //in.reuters.com/video/2018/03/07/trump-optimistic-on-korea-talks-but-expe?videoId=406759786&videoChannel=13423
